snippet: Playing at age 32 with an injured foot, the linebacker Bart Scott understands his price tag no longer makes sense for the Jets. But he is fighting to remain relevant.
abstract: New York Jets linebacker Bart Scott says he is delaying foot surgery in fear it will push him into early retirement; acknowledges that his play has not justified his price.
lead_paragraph: Playing at age 32 with an injured foot, the linebacker Bart Scott understands his price tag no longer makes sense for the Jets. But he is fighting to remain relevant.

headline.seo: Bart Scott Foresees His End as a Jet
headline.main: Fighting for Relevance and Facing His End as a Jet
headline.print_headline: Fighting for Relevance and Facing His End as a Jet
